entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
